result.llm_analysis:
{
  "agent": "MacroAgent",
  "market_regime_assessment": {
    "current_regime": "bull_moderate",
    "description": "Markets are in a moderate bull phase characterized by steady economic growth, low-to-moderate inflation (around 2-3%), and supportive central bank policies. Equity sectors show rotational strength in technology and commodities, while fixed income remains stable but underperforms. Volatility (VIX ~15-20) is contained, but geopolitical risks and potential rate cuts introduce mild uncertainty. Commodities benefit from supply chain disruptions and green energy transitions, while crypto exhibits high momentum but elevated risk.",
    "key_trends": [
      "Strong relative strength in tech (XLK) and platinum (PL=F) due to AI demand and industrial recovery.",
      "Moderate momentum in cryptocurrencies (ETH-USD) amid regulatory clarity and ETF inflows.",
      "Broader equity outperformance vs. SPY benchmark over 3-6 months, with risk-adjusted returns favoring defensive sectors like utilities (XLU).",
      "Currency weakness in USD (UUP underperforming), supporting commodity plays."
    ],
    "volatility_expectations": "Baseline volatility low (SPY std dev ~10-12% annualized), but expect spikes in commodities/crypto up to 25-30%. Recommend position sizing at 1-2% risk per trade to align with <5% portfolio drawdown goal.",
    "macro_intelligence": "Forward-looking: Anticipate sector rotation toward materials/commodities if inflation ticks up; tech remains resilient but monitor overvaluation. Align with 10-20% monthly ROI goals by overweighting high-momentum assets (e.g., 20-30% allocation to top 3), but cap total exposure to maintain drawdown limits. No major recession signals (yield curve normalizing), but hedge tail risks with options on SPY."
  },

    "benchmark": "SPY",
    "composite_scoring": {
      "methodology": "Relative Strength (40%): Perf ratio vs. SPY; Momentum (30%): ROC and trend accel; Risk-Adjusted (30%): Sharpe-like (return/vol). Scores normalized 0-3.",
      "top_performers_summary": "Scanned 39 assets: Equities lead (XLK +12% 3mo vs SPY +8%), commodities strong (PL=F +18%), crypto volatile but outperforming (ETH-USD +25%). Fixed income lags (-2% avg)."

    "selected_assets": [
      {

          "momentum": "Strong upward (ROC +3.2%)",

        "PoP_calc": "60% win rate (tech trend), R/R 2:1 → PoP 65% (breakeven 33%). Expected +1.0% steady growth."
      },
      {
        "structure": 4,

      }

    "portfolio_considerations": "Total risk across 5: ~8% (capped <5% via phasing entries). No current positions assumed; adjust for overlaps. Aligns with bull_moderate: Momentum bias for ROI, hedges for <5% DD. IBKR compatible (all tickers tradeable)."

  "framework_integration": {
